title: In remote valley, Southern Nevada Water Authority goes into ranching business — drawing ire of neighbors
text:
Published By: Las Vegas Sun - Today 
Most water utilities aren’t in the ranching business. But, then again, most water utilities aren’t the SNWA, which grazes up to 11,000 s...
